author: dkhaywood
msg: Fixed bug with validateXxx on properties causing a NPE; renamed NakedObjectUtil#getObjectFrom to the more succinct #unwrap; factored out a new InteractionType to make explicit the fact that modifying parameters on their own (eg to fire off a @RegEx validation) there is no target object (or rather, the target object is the proposed parameter value itself).

author: dkhaywood
msg: HTML Viewer: edit task was failing with NPE for optional fields.
